bike.description: Diamond frame design with hi-tensile steel tubing, sloping top tube design, steel kickstand, and painted steel chainguard
bike.paint_description: Gloss Black, Goldenrod, Kiwi, Sunset Red

components.description: Oversized hi-tensile steel tubular unicrown with leading dropout and fender boss
Alex X303 36H (20") or 28H (16") silver anodized alloy rims with alloy double-sealed front hub, Shimano CB rear, and 14 gauge stainless steel spokes
Polished steel arm 5 1/2" (20") or 4 1/2" (16") with 36T chainring
Cruiser platform with heat-treated axles and rustless bushings
Alloy MX type, extra-long quill, with removeable 4-bolt cap
Foam comfort type with full length,extra-thick, foam bar pads
Alloy pillar style, 25.4 x 300mm, with plugged top, welded seat collar with chromoly QR
Taxi Kids design with extra paddding, extra-thick vinyl cover, & single loop springs with bag loops
